---
title: OpenLayers for R
---

## Installation

You can install openlayers from github with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers")

# latest version
devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers", ref = "develop")
```

## Quickstart

```{r}
library(openlayers)

ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles("terrain-labels") %>%
  set_view(lon = 9.5, lat = 51.31667, zoom = 8)
```

## Basic usage

Call `ol()` to create a map object and add

* layers,
* controls,
* interactions,
* ...

```{r, warning=FALSE}
documenta_town <- c(lon = 9.497968, lat = 51.315699)

ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles("toner") %>%
  add_vector_data(documenta_town,
                  style = marker_style(),
                  popup = "documenta town")
```
